structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.text: A premium finance agreement may provide for the payment by the insured of a delinquency, collection and cancellation charge as provided in section one hundred and sixty-two B of chapter one hundred and seventy-five, and the regulations issued thereunder, and for the assessment and collection of a charge, not to exceed ten dollars, for any check, draft or order for the payment of money submitted in accordance with said agreement which is returned unpaid or not honored by a bank or other depository.
